channel.title: Functional Programming on Mr. Abar
channel.description: Recent content in Functional Programming on Mr. Abar

item.title: Devternity 2021
item.description: Intro Before going to DevTernity 2021 I had no expectations of what might be in there. It was just another conference that was forwarded to me by my manager, and I was just bored enough to decide to sign up for it. I haven’t checked the backgrounds of the presenters and wasn’t even aware that Uncle Bob himself will give a talk there. During the conference, I was amazed by the technical level of presenters and the potential usefulness of the reports.
